data.Title: Google Search Console Experiences Major Reporting Delays
data.Description: Google Search Console is experiencing significant delays in performance reporting, exceeding 75 hours and raising concerns among SEOs. Google has acknowledged the issue and is working on a fix.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews Decline in Mobile Search
data.Description: A recent study reveals that Google's AI-powered search overviews have coincided with a decline in mobile search volume, prompting Google to potentially scale back the feature.

data.Title: Google Search Prioritizes AI-Generated Content, Raising Concerns
data.Description: Concerns are growing as Google's search results appear to prioritize AI-generated content and SEO spam over original, human-created content, potentially impacting the quality and trustworthiness of search results.

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Updates Conversion Data Usage Policy
data.Description: Google Merchant Center has updated its conversion data usage policy, notifying merchants that the data they share may be used for new reporting features and to improve Google Search experiences and services.

data.Title: Bing Updates Webmaster Guidelines with Prompt Injection Policy
data.Description: Bing has added a new guideline to its Bing Webmaster Guidelines named "Prompt Injection," prohibiting the insertion of malicious code into website content to manipulate AI systems.

data.Title: Google Ads Introduces New Brand Exclusion Controls
data.Description: Google Ads has rolled out new brand exclusion controls, but advertisers are reporting that the feature is not yet fully effective in preventing ads from appearing for unrelated brands.

data.Title: Google's Zero-Click Search Results Decline to 58.5%
data.Description: A new study by Rand Fishkin reveals that Google's zero-click search results, where users find information directly on the search results page without clicking through to websites, have decreased from 65% to 58.5%.

data.Title: Google Search Tests "Current Styles" Carousel
data.Description: Google is experimenting with a new "current styles" carousel in search results, potentially impacting searches related to fashion and trends.

data.Title: Google's Greenhouse Gas Emissions Surge 48% in Five Years
data.Description: Google's greenhouse gas emissions have increased by 48% over the past five years, primarily due to the expansion of data centers supporting the company's AI initiatives, raising concerns about the environmental impact of AI development.
